document_data.mainbody:
he Lord of Highmoon was the title of the military, governmental and legal authority of Deepingdale and its capital city of Highmoon. This lordship was not hereditary, but rather appointed to a deserving candidate by the dales town council, a collection of upstanding citizens of the city and surrounding countryside.
1351 DR - ? Theremen Ulath - A fair and just man who exercised the minimum amount of authority needed over Deepingdale.
